title: Challenger Nidalee Bugged
body: Everytime Challenger Nidalee is picked, and shows up on the map for the enemy team, the whole team gets a lag spike, me, and my other 2 friends all got lag spikes everytime we got vision of Challenger nidalee or she walked into sight, late game it wasnt that big of a deal, but early game it gave her an advantage in our last game and it is quite annoying, please fix this.

replies.body:
Heya SquirrelWifNutz -

Thanks for taking the time to report this! We're aware of this particular issue and are working on a fix!
